name: Easy Chatbot
author: Anowar Hossain Rana

sections.description:
Easy Chatbot is a user-friendly plugin that brings an interactive chatbot experience to your WordPress site. This plugin is ideal for businesses looking to enhance their customer service, improve engagement, and streamline communication with visitors.

Features:

  • Easy integration with a shortcode [chatbot_plugin] to display the chatbot on any page or post.
  • Customizable chat log background color, bot reply color, and user question color.
  • Ability to add, edit, and delete custom chat replies directly from the plugin’s settings page.
  • Responsive design that adapts to different screen sizes.
  • Dynamic CSS that allows for seamless color adjustments based on user preferences.
  • Settings page for managing all chatbot configurations, including chat colors and social media links.

License

sections.installation:
1. Upload the chatbot-plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Navigate to ‘Settings’ -> ‘Chatbot Plugin’ to configure your chatbot.
  4. Use the shortcode [chatbot_plugin] to display the chatbot on any page or post.
sections.faq:
How do I add the chatbot to a page?

You can add the chatbot to any page or post by using the shortcode [chatbot_plugin].

Can I customize the chat colors?

Yes, you can customize the chat log background color, bot reply color, and user question color via the plugin’s settings page.

Is the chatbot responsive?

Yes, the chatbot is fully responsive and will adapt to different screen sizes.

How do I delete a custom chat reply?

You can delete a custom chat reply by going to the plugin’s settings page and using the delete option next to the specific reply.
